game.name: CloserLook VR: Oldways
game.categories: Single-player, VR Only, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: CloserLook VR: Oldways is a story-driven VR adventure set in modern-day West Africa. Trapped in a university building, explore secret locations, solve puzzles, and uncover a gripping narrative of exploitation, corruption, and betrayal.
